page.title: Accessing Simulation Results
page.introduction: Results from simulations are automatically stored on the remote database server. The Results button becomes active once results are available for a newly run simulation or when a previously run simulation is selected. The results may be reviewed immediately by pressing the Results button on the Simulation panel of the Application dialog. This activates the Simulation Results Viewer. The viewer for results differ for non-spatial and spatial models.

appearance.para: A list of simulations, both run, failed, in progress and never run are visible and labeled accordingly. If a simulation with results is selected, the results button (graph icon) becomes active (ungreyed).

operations.para: View simulation results by selecting a simulation and pressing the simulation results button. A different results viewer appears for Spatial and Non-spatial(compartmental)results.
